minimumSelection.description: Minimum number of options that must be selected from this group. 0 means it is optional.

maximumSelection.description: Maximum number of options that can be selected from this group. 1 means it is a single select.

maximumOfEachModifier.description: Quantity of each modifier you can at most select. For example if you were selecting a dozen donuts with at most 3 of each variety this would be set to 3 with maximum and minimum selections to 12. 0 means no limit up to group maximum.
